alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Custer; Loup; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 9:00AM CDT until May 30 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN ROCK...LOUP...SOUTHERN BROWN...NORTHWESTERN CUSTER AND BLAINE COUNTIES... At 900 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Brewster, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brewster, Arnold, Merna, Anselmo, Dunning, Rose, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Fox Bayou, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Hawley Flats, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Linscott, Pleasant Hill, Horseshoe Bend Lake, Koshopah, Almeria and Johnsons Corner. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 136 and 154. Highway 2 between mile markers 234 and 270. Highway 92 between mile markers 252 and 273. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
